Name: portachrom production | portachrom | EN15804GD, U
Category: B:Mining and quarrying/07:Mining of metal ores/072:Mining of non-ferrous metal ores/0729:Mining of other non-ferrous metal ores
Description: The mining and following benefication process of chromite results in a 44.9% chromium containing concentrate. The technology is based on iron production. No further chemical treatment is considered, just a production of a fine powder of this concentrate based on limestone crushing and milling technology. It is assumed an overall yield for chromite of 95%.
